str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!
A hand.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
And, even, also, namely.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The sun, sunlight. From hele; the sun; by implication, light.
Instantly, immediately, on the spot. From para and chrema; at the thing itself, i.e. Instantly.
A mist, dimness, darkening. Of uncertain derivation; dimness of sight, i.e. a cataract.
And, even, also, namely.
Darkness, either physical or moral. From the base of skia; shadiness, i.e. Obscurity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To lead or carry about (or around), go about, traverse. From peri and ago; to take around; reflexively, to walk around.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.

word: someone to lead [him] by the hand.
str2: From cheir and a reduplicated form of ago; a hand-leader, i.e. Personal conductor.
